record.title: RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR
record.narrative:
RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR -- (Senate - September 25, 2007)

[Page: S12027]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in recess subject to the call of the Chair.

record.narrative: There being no objection, at 5:01 p.m., the Senate recessed subject to the call of the Chair and reassembled at 5:05 p.m. when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Mr. SALAZAR).
